Tim Psikososial Akan Advokasi SMKN 3 Pandeglang Soal Penganiayaan Belasan Siswa PKL
06 Nov 2019, 09:21 by Dendy Fachreinsyah


Tim Psikososial Akan Advokasi SMKN 3 Pandeglang Soal Penganiayaan Belasan Siswa PKL

KBRN, Pandeglang : Tim Layanan Dukungan Psikososial (LDP) akan melakukan advokasi ke SMK Negeri 3 Pandeglang. Advokasi itu berkaitan dengan kasus penganiayaan yang menimpa 15 siswa saat menjalani Praktek Kerja Lapangan (PKL) disebuah kapal nelayan.Ketua Koordinator LDP Banten, Ahmad Subhan menuturkan, pihaknya perlu melakukan assesment terhadap pihak sekolah maupun korban. Mengingat kasus penganiayaan tersebut tidak cuma melukai secara fisik anak, namun juga secara psikologi.
Baca juga: 15 Siswa Pandeglang Disiksa Saat Menjalani PKL di Kapal Nelayan
"Karena kami khawatirkan kekerasan psikologis karena tidak terlihat. Anak-anak pasti butuh pendampingan untuk memulihkan psikologisnya," ujarnya.Ahmad juga mengaku akan mempertanyakan perihal pengawasan pihak sekolah selama siswanya menjalani PKL. Sebab, kegiatan magang itu dilakukan hingga ke luar daerah."Kami akan menggunakan metode body mapping, untuk melihat sejauh mana anak-anak tersebut mendapat kekerasan fisik. Setelah itu akan mendekatkan secara psikologisnya. Hasil ini akan kami berikan ke psikolog pfofesional untuk melihat dampak yang dialami oleh belasan anak-anak itu," ujarnya.Oleh karena itu, selain bakal mengadvokasi, Ahmad juga berharap pihak sekolah bisa memberi informasi ke dinas terkait seperti Dinas Sosial setempat. Karena bukan tidak mungkin, anak-anak yang menjadi korban kekerasan membutuhkan pendampingan psikologis."Apalagi kami dapat info anak-anak tidak sekolah. Mungkin saja ini karena gangguan psikologis. Kami juga akan mencoba mendatangi beberapa anak untuk dilakukan assesment awal," tutur pria yang juga menjabat sebagai Sakti Peksos Pandeglang ini.Sebelumnya diberitakan, sebanyak 15 siswa SMK Negeri 3 Pandeglang jurusan Nautika Penangkap Ikan mengalami nasih nahas saat mengikuti PKL disebuah kapal nelayan. Belasan siswa tersebut dianiaya oleh ABK senior saat berlayar mencari ikan ke lautan Papua.Kejadian itu bermula saat para siswa PKL berangkat dari Pelabuhan Perikanan di Kecamatan Juwana, Kabupaten Pati, Jawa Tengah, menggunakan kapal berkapasitas 200 gross tonnage (GT).Namun selama diperjalanan, belasan siswa itu malah mendapat perlakuan tidak menyenangkan karena kerap disiksa oleh ABK. Bahkan ironisnya, mereka harus mengkonsumsi makanan sisa dari orang lain.

Psychosocial Team Will Advocate SMKN 3 Pandeglang About the Persecution of Dozens of PKL Students
Nov 6, 2019, 09:21 by Dendy Fachreinsyah


Psychosocial Team Will Advocate SMKN 3 Pandeglang About the Persecution of Dozens of PKL Students

KBRN, Pandeglang: The Psychosocial Support Services Team (LDP) will conduct advocacy to SMK Negeri 3 Pandeglang. Advocacy is related to the case of persecution that befell 15 students while undergoing Field Work Practices (PKL) on a fishing boat. The head of the Banten LDP Coordinator, Ahmad Subhan said, his party needed to conduct an assessment of the school and the victim. Given the case of abuse is not only physically hurt the child, but also psychologically.
Also read: 15 Pandeglang Students Tortured While Undergoing Street Vendors on Fishing Boats
"Because we are worried about psychological violence because it is not seen. Children certainly need assistance to restore their psychological," he said. Because, the apprenticeship is carried out outside the region. "We will use the body mapping method, to see the extent to which the children are physically abused. After that we will be psychologically closer. These results will be given to professional psychologists to see the impact experienced by dozens of children, "he said. Therefore, besides going to advocate, Ahmad also hoped that the school could provide information to related agencies such as the local Social Service. Because it is not impossible, children who are victims of violence need psychological assistance. "Moreover, we have information that children are not in school. Maybe this is due to psychological disorders. We will also try to visit some children for initial assessment," said the man also served as the Social Worker of Pandeglang. Previously it was reported that as many as 15 students of SMK Negeri 3 Pandeglang majoring in Nautical Fish Catching experienced nih while experiencing street vendors on a fishing boat. Dozens of students were persecuted by senior ABK while sailing for fish to the Papua sea. The incident began when PKL students departed from the Fishery Port in Juwana District, Pati Regency, Central Java, using a 200 gross tonnage (GT) boat. dozens of students were even treated unfavorably because ABK was often tortured. Even ironically, they have to consume leftovers from other people.
